title: Mariah Carey

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Every night, select one player to control and one player to target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your target will be notified of the fact that they were controlled.
- You will learn your target's role.
- If your target has an investigative ability, you will receive investigative feedback
